long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We all know how much chrome likes to eat ram, so save some ram, and learn to manage tabs.
Project Source Code can be found here: https://github.com/Petty-Exploits/Tab-Limiter
Added in some cheat codes to get more tabs, theres also an imposter amongst the update
